articles.author: PTI
articles.title: 'A stunning public rebuke': US media praises PM Modi's comments to Putin on Ukraine war - The Indian Express
articles.description: The Narendra Modi-Vladimir Putin conversation during the SCO summit in Samarkand was widely carried by the mainstream American media.
articles.content:
The Modi-Putin conversation in Samarkand was widely carried by the mainstream American media.
“Modi rebukes Putin over war in Ukraine, The Washington Post reported in a headline. In a stunning publi… [+1800 chars]
